official_title: A bill to authorize any bank holding company to acquire control of banks located outside of the State in which such bank holding company is located.

summary.text: Amends the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to permit a bank holding company to acquire banks in States other than the State in which the holding company is located.

titles.title: A bill to authorize any bank holding company to acquire control of banks located outside of the State in which such bank holding company is located.
